mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid_tb (user_id, auction_id, bid_money, bid_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{auctionId}, #{bidMoney}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.user_id AS userId, b.auction_id AS auctionId, b.bid_money AS lateBidMoney, b.bid_time AS bidTime, u.name AS userName FROM bid_tb b JOIN userentity u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.auction_id = #{auctionId} ORDER BY b.bid_time DESC LIMIT 1
